mods.abstract: DETAINED in the jail of the parish of St. John the Baptist the negro boy JAMES, he says he belongs to Mr. Dick Johnson of the parish of Plaquemines, below the City, has been gone for about two months, meaures 5 feet, 9 inches, appears to be about 25 years, speaks english only. The owner is hereby duly notified to claim his property according to law. Parish of St John the Baptist, November 25th 1859. URSIN JACOB, Sheriff.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
